title: The Conspiracy Zone
overview: The Conspiracy Zone is a half-hour comedic discussion on a specific conspiracy topic. There is a guest panel, which includes three guests who are experienced in the topic. There is a second part of the show where a fourth guest who comes out; usually they are connected directly/indirectly involved with the conspiracy. As Kevin Nealon says, "If we've made just one person a little paranoid, we've done our job".
